      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected void onCreate(Bundle savedInstanceState)
      This function is switch ON or OFF the mode of the download the picture for the items  This state information includes:  * The Setting has the following features and function:    The function turn on the mode of download pictures for items  The function turn off the mode of download pictures for items  if user chooses to enable download the pictures for items, the switch turns ON.  Else if, the switch will be off and disable download pictures for items.  Once the switch turn ON or OFF, the controller will change the value of function  which called EnableDownloadPhotos and DisableDownloadPhotos

    • Method Detail

      • onCreate

        protected void onCreate(Bundle savedInstanceState)
        This function is switch ON or OFF the mode of the download the picture for the items  This state information includes:  *
          The Setting has the following features and function:   
        1. The function turn on the mode of download pictures for items 
        2. The function turn off the mode of download pictures for items 
        3. if user chooses to enable download the pictures for items, the switch turns ON. 
        4. Else if, the switch will be off and disable download pictures for items. 
        5. Once the switch turn ON or OFF, the controller will change the value of function 
        6. which called EnableDownloadPhotos and DisableDownloadPhotos   
        Since:
        2015-11-03
